title: So I blundered into Gameplay again...
body:
I swear I read the downvoted threads that have some degree of planning and forethought rather than the upvoted bandwagon "X NEED NERF RITO", and I actually feel that they are downvoted in order to protect the fragile mental state of those that just can't handle the truth.

Legit I think senior players downvote them cause they are all like :

http://s3-ak.buzzfeed.com/static/enhanced/terminal01/2011/5/11/13/enhanced-buzz-844-1305134980-8.jpg

Edit : Senior players proving me right. :D

replies.body:
downvoted because longer than a sentence :( who do you think I am, a librarian? 

/sarcasm
Kind of true, but alot of the preseason crap IS a lil op..

> [{quoted}](name=Shac Norris,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=iAAjQboz,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-11-16T23:24:54.106+0000)
>
> Kind of true, but alot of the preseason crap IS a lil op..

I quite like the chaos. Shakes things up a bit. Although yes, I can't but agree with the fact some of the changes were OTT.
Well we still have Rammus to put some order in all this :)
and {{champion:44}} supp to bring back the fab :)
Get bedazzled bitches!

> [{quoted}](name=Shac Norris,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=iAAjQboz,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2015-11-16T23:41:50.558+0000)
>
> Well we still have Rammus to put some order in all this :)

{{champion:54}} "Don't forget me pls" ;-;
finally someone who feels the way I do <3

Preseason is meant to be crazy. Riot does the big changes when there's no competitive going on for a reason. I understand wanted narf and bufs and other forms of feed back but people seem to be going a bit crazy about it. We get it, Graves is strong, Yas/Try annoying, 'mah jungle!" etc, but it is kind of annoying to hear so many "I'm quitting" threads. Just hang in there, league will be better as a result of this insanity. And unless you've played on the PBE before and seen true craziness, you have nothing to complain about. I've seen some things man, things you should be happy aren't happening on live.

How I imagine people's reaction when someone uses the forbidden art of common sense.

https://media.giphy.com/media/GhbwCoeQLXWx2/giphy.gif
Upvoted cus bill nye

Us Senior players don't upvote that crap. The new players upvote it. Senior players barely even touch these forums anymore because we all know these idiots have no idea what they're talking about. Even when you try to talk sense into them, they don't learn. Like all them people saying Rageblade+Runaan's Kog is OP. I don't think any of them even realize Runaan's doesn't proc Rageblade stacks.
Shhhhh, don't tell them that.
I can tell them all day long and they wouldn't listen to me. New players accept as much advice from senior players as ghetto kids do from their teachers.
I remember an arguement happening on the boards about Thresh. A diamond support player said Thresh wasn't that good and got down voted to hell. Interesting experience.
Hey. I'm a "senior player" and I don't appreciate you saying that I'm the one downvoting these threads. Sometimes, I make one or two. Then people tell me I'm just bad at the game. Why?
He meant players that have been around for a few seasons...not retired gamers :P
I'M NOT IN MY SIXTIES GOOD SIR. HOW DARE YOU ACCUSE ME OF SUCH! *slap*
well... Are you?

I'm not saying you downvote threads that are well constructed because you may or may not agree with it, but in order to prevent the bandwagonners with frail mental states from discovering that in fact, the thing they are crying over mostly have way of being dealt with. Y'know, common sense. Which they lack.
You should look at the old Season 1- Season 3 boards (if they're still up) People broke down micro decisions and micro mathematics into tables. {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

Turn the Forums into reddit, get redditors. 

if you build it they will come. 

This is no Forum.

Welcome to the LoL Forums.
I blame Memes and Games.
I blame anyone ever hinting that league is a solo game and should be played that way
It snowballs into what we see today

I once got down voted for using science.

RIP Caitlyn.
Oh dear, you've activated my Alucard :p
I pretty much be upvoted the threads talking about how games are decided before 15minutes

Pretty much.

I've been trying to post stuff there for a while about thoughtful approaches to the problems preseason has presented and within 5 minutes they get down voted to crap and the boards sheep assume it is a bad thread.
